raw_comment:
I noticed that the majority of optimists are the younger generation 
I wonder if the reason why the U.S. optimists are so high is because of the concept of the American dream
This relates to me and my community cause this can be interpreted in many different ways. it could be seen as the world getting better environmentally, economically or humanity wise. it really depends on which way you look at it
The catchy headline I came up with was "Is the world improving?" and this graph answers what certain age groups believe.
ace_sentences: I noticed that most optimists are young people.
I wonder about the reason for this.
Many optimists in the US exist.
I think that the American dream may be a reason.
This can be interpreted in many different ways.
The world may be getting better environmentally.
The world may be getting better economically.
The world may be getting better in terms of humanity.
The interpretation depends on the perspective.
The headline is: Is the world improving?
This graph answers what certain age groups believe.
